summary: Separated at the end of the Vietnam war, an "Americanized" woman and her Vietnamese mother are reunited after 22 years.
cast: Mai Thi Kim|Heidi Neville-Bub|Gerald Ford|Tom Miller|Tran Tuong Nhu|Mabel Neville|Don Neville|Royce Hughes|Wanda Hamlett|John Bub|Do Huu Vinh|Do Trong Tinh|Do Thi Thu Hien|Do Thi Hong Lien|Dinh Dung|Kaitlin Neville|Jessica Neville|Brenda Lewis
title: Daughter from Danang
